message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product to you for $95. I believe it will be very valuable for you.
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $85. Can you meet me at that price?
I understand your position, Bob. However, the product is worth a lot to me, and $85 is cutting it too close. Would you consider $90?
I appreciate your flexibility, Alice, but I'm still a bit above $90. How about $87.50? I'm willing to meet you halfway
Bob, I appreciate you working with me on this.  How about we split the difference again and settle at $88.75?
I'm still a bit above that, Alice. How about $86.25? I'm trying to get as close as I can to the price you're willing to sell it for
Bob, you seem really set on this product.  I'm willing to come down slightly to $87 to make this deal happen.
I appreciate the flexibility, Alice, but I think I can do better than $87. How about $85.50? I'm really trying to get the best deal I can
Bob, this is getting ridiculous.  My absolute final offer is $86.  Take it or leave it.
I'm not going to go any higher, Alice. I'll meet you at $85, and that's my final offer. If you're not willing to sell it to me for that price, I'll have to walk away and buy it from John for $100
